data.name: ConfirmationOf
data.value: Conferma della stipula di un contratto

data.name: IRDConfText2
data.value: Lo scopo di questa lettera (la "Conferma") è definire i termini e le condizioni della transazione di uno swap da noi stipulata alla data di esecuzione sotto riportata.
data.comment: The purpose of this letter (this "Confirmation") is to confirm the terms and conditions of the Swap Transaction entered into between us on the Trade Date specified below.

data.name: IRDConfText3
data.value: Le definizioni e le clausole qui di seguito utilizzate si riferiscono alle definizioni ISDA 2006 pubblicate dall'International Swaps and Derivatives Association e sono incluse in questa Conferma. Nel caso di eventuali incoerenze tra le definizioni e quanto indicato in questa conferma, prevale quest'ultima.
data.comment: The definitions and provisions contained in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, as published by the International Swaps and Derivatives Association, Inc., are incorporated into this Confirmation. In the event of any inconsistency between those definitions and provisions and this Confirmation, this Confirmation will govern.

data.name: IRDConfText4
data.value: Questo documento che costituisce una "Conferma", rappresenta quanto indicato nell'"ISDA Master Agreement" ed eventuali supplementi stipulato in data
data.comment: This Confirmation constitutes a "Confirmation" as referred to in, and supplements, forms part of and is subject to, the ISDA Master Agreement dated as of

data.name: IRDConfText5
data.comment: as amended and supplemented from time to time (the "Agreement"), between

data.name: IRDConfText7
data.value: Tutte le clausole contenute nel contratto quadro ("Master Agreement") regolano questa "Conferma" ad eccezione di quanto diversamente riportato.
data.comment: All provisions contained in the Agreement govern this Confirmation except as expressly modified below.

data.name: Signature
data.value: Si prega di confermare che quanto sopra riportato sia correttamente espresso secondo le condizioni del nostro accordo inviandoci copia del presente contratto da Voi controfirmato.
data.comment: Please confirm that the foregoing correctly sets forth the terms of our agreement by executing the copy of this Confirmation enclosed for that purpose and returning it to us or by sending to us a letter substantially similar to this letter, which letter sets forth the material terms of the Transaction to which this Confirmation relates and indicates your agreement to those terms.

data.name: Confirmed
data.value: Letto confermato e sottoscritto alla data sopra indicata:
data.comment: Confirmed as of the date first above written:

data.comment: The first day of each Calculation Period

data.name: FXConfText2
data.value: Lo scopo di questa lettera (la "Conferma") è definire i termini e le condizioni della transazione da noi stipulata alla data di esecuzione sotto riportata..
data.comment: The purpose of this letter agreement (this "Confirmation") is to confirm the terms and conditions of the Transaction entered into between us on the Trade Date specified below (the "Transaction").

data.name: FXConfText3
data.value: Le definizioni e le clausole qui di seguito utilizzate si riferiscono alle definizioni 1998 FX and Currency Option pubblicate dall'International Swaps and Derivatives Association, dall'Emerging Markets Traders Association e dal Foreign Exchange Committee e sono incluse in questa Conferma. Nel caso di eventuali incoerenze tra le definizioni e quanto indicato in questa conferma, prevale quest'ultima.
data.comment: This Confirmation constitutes a "Confirmation" as referred to in the Agreement specified below. The definitions and provisions contained in the 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions (as published by the International Swaps and Derivatives Association, Inc., the Emerging Markets Traders Association and The Foreign Exchange Committee) are incorporated into this Confirmation. In the event of any inconsistency between those definitions and provisions and this Confirmation, this Confirmation will govern.

data.name: FXConfText4
data.value: Questo documento che costituisce una "Conferma", rappresenta quanto indicato nell'"ISDA Master Agreement" ed eventuali supplementi
data.comment: This Confirmation supplements, forms a part of, and is subject to, the ISDA Master Agreement

data.name: FXConfText6
data.comment: , as amended and supplemented from time to time (the "Agreement"), between

data.name: FXConfText8
data.value: Tutte le clausole contenute nel contratto quadro ("Master Agreement") regolano questa "Conferma" ad eccezione di quanto diversamente riportato.
data.comment: All provisions contained in the Agreement govern this Confirmation except as expressly modified below.

data.name: TwoBusinessDaysAfterTheDateThatTheBinaryEventOccurs
data.value: Due giorni business successivi alla data di occorrenza dell'evento binario.
data.comment: Two Business Days after the date that the Binary Event (if any) occurs.

data.comment: Call Currency and Call Currency Amount:

data.comment: Put Currency and Put Currency Amount:

data.value: Direzione del tasso di cambio spot:

data.name: EventPeriodStartDateAndTime
data.value: Data e orario di inizio del periodo eventi:
data.comment: Event Period Start Date and Time:

data.name: EventPeriodEndDateAndTime
data.value: Data e orario di fine del periodo eventi:
data.comment: Event Period End Date and Time:

data.name: AdditionalDefinitions
data.value: Additional definitions for the Transaction to which this Confirmation relates are as follows:
data.comment: Additional definitions for the Transaction to which this Confirmation relates are as follows:

data.name: EventPeriodMeans
data.value: "Event Period" means the period commencing on the date and at the time this Currency Option is entered into and ending at the Expiration Time on the Expiration Date.
data.comment: "Event Period" means the period commencing on the date and at the time this Currency Option is entered into and ending at the Expiration Time on the Expiration Date.

data.name: BinaryEventMeans
data.value: "Binary Event" means that, at any time during the Event Period , the Spot Exchange Rate (in comparison to the Initial Spot Rate) is equal to or beyond the Binary Level, as determined by the Calculation Agent.
data.comment: "Binary Event" means that, at any time during the Event Period , the Spot Exchange Rate (in comparison to the Initial Spot Rate) is equal to or beyond the Binary Level, as determined by the Calculation Agent.

data.name: SpotExchangeMeans
data.value: "Spot Exchange Rate" means the price in the Spot Market for one or more actual foreign exchange transactions involving the Currency Pair (or cross-rates constituting such Currency Pair) which is the subject of this Currency Option as determined by the Calculation Agent.
data.comment: "Spot Exchange Rate" means the price in the Spot Market for one or more actual foreign exchange transactions involving the Currency Pair (or cross-rates constituting such Currency Pair) which is the subject of this Currency Option as determined by the Calculation Agent.

data.name: SpotMarketMeans
data.value: "Spot Market" means the global spot foreign exchange market, open continuously from 5:00 a.m. Sydney time on a Monday in any week to 5:00 p.m. New York time on the Friday of that week.
data.comment: "Spot Market" means the global spot foreign exchange market, open continuously from 5:00 a.m. Sydney time on a Monday in any week to 5:00 p.m. New York time on the Friday of that week.

data.name: NotificationOfEvent
data.value: "Notification of event": the Calculation Agent shall promptly notify the other Party (or Parties if the Calculation Agent is not a Party) of the occurrence of an event relating to this Currency Option. A failure to give such notice shall not prejudice or invalidate the occurrence or effect of an event.
data.comment: "Notification of event": the Calculation Agent shall promptly notify the other Party (or Parties if the Calculation Agent is not a Party) of the occurrence of an event relating to this Currency Option. A failure to give such notice shall not prejudice or invalidate the occurrence or effect of an event.

data.name: Settlement:IfBinaryEventHasOccurred
data.value: "Settlement": if a Binary Event has occurred, the Seller will pay the Buyer the Binary Payout on the Settlement Date.
data.comment: "Settlement": if a Binary Event has occurred, the Seller will pay the Buyer the Binary Payout on the Settlement Date.

data.name: EQDConfText2
data.value: Lo scopo di questa lettera (la "Conferma") è definire i termini e le condizioni della transazione da noi stipulata alla data di esecuzione sotto riportata.
data.comment: The purpose of this letter agreement (this "Confirmation") is to confirm the terms and conditions of the Transaction entered into between us on the Trade Date specified below (the "Transaction").

data.name: EQDConfText3
data.value: Questo documento che costituisce una "Conferma", rappresenta quanto indicato nell'"ISDA Master Agreement" di seguito specificato.
data.comment: This Confirmation constitutes a "Confirmation" as referred to in the Agreement specified below.

data.name: EQDConfText4
data.value: Le definizioni e le clausole qui di seguito utilizzate si riferiscono alle definizioni ISDA 2002 pubblicate dall'International Swaps and Derivatives Association e sono incluse in questa Conferma.
data.comment: The definitions and provisions contained in the 2002 ISDA Equity Derivatives Definitions (the "Equity Definitions"), as published by the International Swaps and Derivatives Association, Inc., are incorporated into this Confirmation.

data.name: EQDConfText5
data.value: Nel caso di eventuali incoerenze tra le definizioni e quanto indicato in questa conferma, prevale quest'ultima.
data.comment: In the event of any inconsistency between the Equity Definitions and this Confirmation, this Confirmation will govern.

data.name: EQDConfText6
data.value: Questo documento che costituisce una "Conferma", rappresenta quanto indicato nell'"ISDA Master Agreement" ed eventuali supplementi
data.comment: This Confirmation supplements, forms a part of, and is subject to, the ISDA Master Agreement

data.name: EQDConfText8
data.comment: , as amended and supplemented from time to time (the "Agreement"), between

data.name: EQDConfText10
data.value: Tutte le clausole contenute nel contratto quadro ("Master Agreement") regolano questa "Conferma" ad eccezione di quanto diversamente riportato.
data.comment: All provisions contained in the Agreement govern this Confirmation except as expressly modified below.
